post.body: The mall, i hate it when u dont know how much your gift card is worth
DISNEYLAND
BJS with some amazing FUSEers, there all amazing people.
5?5466gagagain?515........misssspeling isd okat ton Twitter

Watching Lakers play
Happy New year to all my peeps

I said no way, not secure enough i guess
Jody is trying to get me to buy a pink polo
Up late reading up on my Judah/Israel Kings. Feeling great after hearing Boston lost again (Lakers # 1) Still can't sleep...back to reading
The Mall is crazy...wished i stayed home
LAKERS Win!!!
